ebukhaya-community-water-project.title: Augmentation of Ebukhaya Community Water Project
ebukhaya-community-water-project.objective: The initiative supports Climate Smart water supply, enhancing resilience in Central and North East Bunyore wards.

ekamanji-community-water-project.title: Ekamanji Community Climate Resilient Water Project
ekamanji-community-water-project.objective: To provide a reliable and climate resilient water supply to communities in Luanda Township ward and adjacent areas.
activities: Construction of water supply infrastructure (pipelines, storage tanks)
Commissioning and handover of the scheme
Maintenance planning and climate resilience measures
ekamanji-community-water-project.status: Completed, Paid & In Use (Managed by VIWASCO)

maragoli-hills-forest-rehabilitation.title: Rehabilitation of 70 Acres of Maragoli Hills Forest
maragoli-hills-forest-rehabilitation.objective: To restore and rehabilitate Maragoli Hills by fencing degraded catchment areas and re-establishing forest cover.
maragoli-hills-forest-rehabilitation.status: Completed & Paid (Under maintenance and managed by KFS)

mutave-jepsesi-bridge.title: Construction of Mutave–Jepsesi Bridge
mutave-jepsesi-bridge.objective: To improve connectivity and resilience by constructing a durable bridge linking Mutave and Jepsesi localities.
activities: Construction of bridge superstructure and decking

vigina-water-project.title: Equipping, Expansion and Solarization of Vigina Water Project
vigina-water-project.objective: To improve and expand water supply services in Lyaduywa/Idzava Ward.

nadiradi-community-water-project.title: Augmentation of Nadiradi Community Water Project
nadiradi-community-water-project.objective: To expand and strengthen the Nadiradi water supply infrastructure for sustained access to safe water.
activities: Installation of 100,000-litre elevated steel tank on 12m tower

kaptik-mwala-water-project.title: Construction of Kaptik–Mwala Community Climate Resilient Water Project
kaptik-mwala-water-project.objective: To expand and strengthen water supply infrastructure in Kaptik-Mwala area.

kegondi-community-water-project.title: Construction of Kegondi Community Climate Resilient Water Project
kegondi-community-water-project.objective: To provide a reliable, climate resilient water supply system to the Kegondi community.

buhani-irrigation-project.objective: To enable farmers to shift from subsistence to commercially viable irrigated agriculture.
